name: U.F.O.s
content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select a file with *.DAT extension
game:
  game_id: gnap
  path: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- write_file:
    content: '#!/bin/bash

      src=$1

      dst=$2

      src_path=$(echo "$1" | sed -r "s/(.+)\/.+/\1/")

      find "$src_path" -type f \( -iname "*.AVI" -o -iname "*.DAT" -o -iname "*.EXE"
      -o -iname "*.MID" \) -exec cp {} "$dst" \;'
    file: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- chmodx: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- execute:
    args: $game $GAMEDIR
    file: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
